title: 3 bdrm/1 bath apt. on Belmont/Sacremento $1950
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   A 3 bedroom/1 bath newly remodeled apartment is available for rent on Belmont Avenue and Sacremento.  $1950/month for the 3 bedroom/1 bath, not including utilities. Laundry is on site. Parking spots are available. Section 8 are welcome.  If interested, please call Mike at 773_616_1667. Call anytime.
